quote: However high we climb in the pursuit of knowledge we shall still see heights above us, and the more we extend our view, the more conscious we shall be of the immensity which lies beyond.
quote_letters: HOWEVER HIGH WE CLIMB IN THE PURSUIT OF KNOWLEDGE WE SHALL STILL SEE HEIGHTS ABOVE US AND THE MORE WE EXTEND OUR VIEW THE MORE CONSCIOUS WE SHALL BE OF THE IMMENSITY WHICH LIES BEYOND
